shayris.shayriText:
खो गयी हूँ..इन रास्तो में कही

जहाँ से वापसी भी मुमकिन नही

ना कोई चेहरा अपना सा लगता है

ना कोई रास्ता पहचाना साखो गयी हूँ..इन रास्तो में कही

जहाँ से वापसी भी मुमकिन नही

ना कोई चेहरा अपना सा लगता है

ना कोई रास्ता पहचाना सा
Not imitation, not following, find yourself, know yourself go your own way.

हम ये नहीं चाहते कि कोई आपके लिए दुआ ना मांगे

हम तो बस इतना चाहते है कि कोई दुआ में आपको ना मांगे।

गलियां  वहीं  है , मेने  शहर  नहीं  बदला।

एक  अर्से  से  यहां  अपना  घर  नहीं  बदला।

ना जाने कब वो अचानक से याद कर लें मुझको।

बस यही सोचकर आज भी अपना नंबर नहीं बदला।

देख लेती हूँ तस्वीर तेरी .. जब भी परेशान होती हूँ..,,,

मानो महज़ तस्वीर से ही तू मेरे दर्द खींच लेता हो

If you want to be happy, set a goal
That awakens your intellect and strength
And will create hope and inspiration in you.

सोचा था उससे बिछड़ेंगे तो मर जायेंगे... 

जानलेवा ख़ौफ़ था हुआ कुछ भी नहीं...y

शक से भी अक्सर खत्म हो जाते हैं कुछ रिश्ते..

कसूर हर बार गल्तियों का नही होता..

धडकनों को कुछ तो काबू में कर ए दिल..

अभी तो पलकें झुकाई है, मुस्कुराना अभी बाकी है उनका�

Success comes from what we do,

Consistently, not occasionally.

Of course it's hard. It's supposed to be hard,

If it was easy, everyone would do it. Hard is what makes it great.

सोचा नहीं था कभी
इतना याद आयेगा तू..

के अब तो खुद को ही
याद करना मैं भुला दूं..

आजकल कौन किस के
झमेले में यहां फंसता है..

कॉपी पेस्ट करना ही हमें
बहुत आसान लगता है..

Even if you live without being famous, it is possible to live a beautiful life
But to be famous without living a life like this can never be a beautiful life.

छोड़कर पुरानी बातें नए युग में
नई सोच को अपनाएं हम..

आओ दोस्तों, किसी की कॉपी
ना करने की कसम खाए हम..

सजी हैं महफ़िल
ज़रा अपनी तशरीफ़ ले आना..

तुम्हारे बिना बनती नहीं
मुझसे कोई शायरी मेरी जाना..

Patience is not the ability to wait, 

But the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting.

सागर की असीम गहराई
लहरों से सवाल कर गई..

कश्ती को संभालती लहरें
उस के सवालों से डर गई..

Good things come to people who wait,

but better things come to those who go out and get them.

सब्र मेरा तुम आजमाते रहे
अपने सपने दिल में सजाते रहे..

जो दिल में था प्यार मेरे लिए
गुरूर में अपने मुझसे छुपाते रहे..

तेरी यादों से आजकल
दूर जा रहा हूं मैं..

मेरी नींद से भी अब
सौदा कर रहा हूं मैं..
No matter if it seems impossible,no matter if it takes time,no matter if you have to up all night, just remember that the feeling of success is the best thing in entire world.

ये कैसा असर तुम्हारी मोहब्बत में
आज मेरे दिल पर छा गया है..

लिखना था अपना नाम, मगर मेरे
होठों पर नाम तेरा आ गया है..

मुझे बदलने की कोशिश छोड़कर
काश तुम मुझे ऐसे ही अपना लेते..

बेवजह की हर बहस भूलकर तुम
मेरी मोहब्बत को बाहों में समेट लेते..

Once you learn how to create your own,

Happiness, no one can take it from you.

If you are always trying to be normal, 

You will never know how amazing you can be.
Be a good person, but don't waste time trying to prove it.
Choose your habits carefully ,they decide your future.
Sometimes later becomes never.
Great People, they don't Cry, They Try.

Study hard and focus on your goals,

One day you're gonna make yourself proud.

SUCCESS DEMANDS FOR SACRIFICES. 

SACRIFICE OF SLEEP,

SACRIFICE OF ENTERTAINMENT, 

SACRIFICE OF COMFORT ZONE.

When you finally get something good, enjoy it,

Don't always go looking for something better.
Never hate failures, it’s just a way to come closer to victory.
Be a good person, but don't waste time trying to prove it.

Use your energy to create not destroy,

Stop checking your phone every minute No one loves you.

कभी तो छोड़ देते ये मर्दों वाला गुरुर
सोच लेते कभी तुम औरत बनकर..

मोहब्बत को थोड़ा और समझ लेते
खुद को सिर्फ़ मेरा मेहबूब समझकर..

Keep your energy focused on

Your goals and dreams.
It doesn’t matter what others are doing its matter what YOU are doing.
Education is the most powerful weapon you can use to change the world.

"It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you

DO NOT STOP."
Once you learn how to create your own happiness, no one can take it from you.

कॉपी करने से भले ही
तुम्हें मिलेंगे फायदे..

मगर अपने आत्मसम्मान
के करो तुम कायदे..
Don't give up just because things got hard.
No matter how great the Talent or efforts some things just take time.

Stay motivated and keep patience, 

It will come to you when you deserve it.

When you focus on problems you will have more problems,

When you focus on possibilities you'll  have more opportunities.
All things are difficult before they become easy.
Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines practiced every day.

खुद की मेहनत से काम करना ही
हमेशा सफलता प्रदान करता है..

किसी को आदर्श मानकर कॉपी
करना मगर बड़ा आसान होता है..

Choose Joy!

Don’t wait for things to get easier, simpler, better,

Life will always be complicated,

Learn to be happy right now,

Otherwise, you’ll run out of time.
Your future depends on what you do today and your today has already started.
Keep studying On Regular basis.
Successful people never worry about what others are doing.

Those who put in more effort, 

Enjoy the feelings of success.

आज मन करता हैं
के गले से लगा लूं तुझे..

जब तू मेरा था तब ये
अहसास, था नहीं मुझे..
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want the most.

न जाने कहां गुम हो गई है
नए विचारों की सादगी..

अब तो कॉपी पेस्ट में अटक
गई है यारों, हमारी जिंदगी..
Whatever you are, be a good one.
Your level of success is determined by your level of discipline and perseverance.

No matter what happens in the world around you,

You have the power to create your own ability.
If you want to be successful you have to be willing to disappear for a while.

Stay motivated and keep patience,

It will come to you when you deserve it.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

Rule of success Never lose hope,

And keep on working.

You will never always be motivated,

So you must learn to be disciplined.
Studying doesn't suck as much as falling.

Only when you do not know yourself, 

The opinion of other people becomes important.
A Little Progress Each Day Adds Up To Big Results.
Life is 10% of what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
The smile on my face does not mean my life is perfect. It means that despite my challenges, I choose to focus on my blessings

The amount of work is more than his words
Success comes to him
Because as deep as that river
The sound of it flowing is so low.

This is the way to acquire skills
1 Remember the experience of others
2 Put your purpose first
3 Make up your own mind
4 Practice as much as possible

No love is greater than the love of a mother,
No care is greater than the care of the father.

Don’t say, just work.
Don’t look, just show.
Don’t promise, just prove it.

From the ugly words of a beautiful face
The sweetness of the ugly mouth is better.

May life be a constant rush of action
The grave is there to rest forever.

Remember who you are or what you have
Your happiness does not depend on it
Your happiness depends on how you think

सौगात में आपको देते हैं
हम अपने सपनों का ये शहर..

रखना बस हमारी तरफ आप
अपना दिल, जिगर और नज़र..

Man was not created for defeat
He may be destroyed
But it cannot be lost.

Success is a lot like teachers
It forces skilled and intelligent people to think that they will never lose.

Beautiful hair will leave you one day
But wisdom will be with you forever.

If wolves live with herds
You will one day learn to roar as a cat.

He who has nothing in his hand has time in his hand
This is actually the biggest asset.

The time will come and go again
But when he is there, you will get what you want from him

Give true value to time
Seize every moment, enjoy, don’t be lazy,
Don’t leave what you can do for tomorrow.

Regret now for the time it wasted before
Now is the time to waste.

Time = life
So wasting time means wasting part of life
Utilizing time will also be meaningful in life.

It is not possible to bring him back when he is lost
But if you want, you can make the time ahead beautiful.

There is nothing wrong with the past, don’t regret it, it won’t come back
Instead of how beautifully arranged the present.

Ordinary people don’t care much about time
Intelligent people want to keep up with the times.

The time will come and go again
But when he is there, you will get what you want from him.

Believe in yourself
Rely on your own abilities
Humble on his own strength
But you can’t be successful or happy without enough confidence

Survival alone is not the fulfillment of human life
Success is hidden in finding meaningful reasons to survive.

तेरी बातो पर ऐतबार हम करेंगे,

तेरा इंतज़ार हम करेंगे,

जब मिलोगे हमसे तब देख लेना,

प्यार बेपनाह तुमसे हम करेंगे�!!!

Life is the name of a picture drawn in pencil
No part of which can be removed with rubber.

People’s whole life is like numbers
And we have to find a solution for the rest of our lives.

That makes living a simple life
Happiness is very cheap for him.

जब इश्क की बिमारी लगी,,,

मैं बीना मेकअप के भी प्यारी लगी,,,

🥰❤❤

Yes and no, the two are the oldest and the youngest
But these are the two things to think about the most.
